question:
Which of the following statements is/are correct regarding the Yarn Bank Scheme, recently launched to avoid the fluctuation in yarn price?
  1. Food Corporation of India has been entrusted with the responsibility to procure yarn at minimum support price
  2. It is an initiative of the Ministry of Textiles
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Statement 1 is not correct: The Scheme provides interest-free corpus fund up to Rs.2.00 crore to the Special Purpose Vehicle formed by power loom weavers to enable them to purchase yarn at the wholesale rate and give the yarn at a reasonable price to the small weavers to avoid the middleman and local supplier\'s brokerage charge on sales of yarn. Statement 2 is correct: The Union Ministry of Textiles has launched a Yarn Bank Scheme to avoid fluctuation in yarn price with effect from 01.04.2017 to 31.03.2020.It is one of the component of PowerTex India, a comprehensive scheme for power loom sector development.
